funding ▼

i currently have a time budget of ~15hrs/week, and a cost budget of virtually nothing. my time budget will only be getting smaller once my little one goes to nursery, as i'll be going back to work. if you would like to support my projects, please stick some cash in my pocket. put your @ in the message so i know who to thank :) cheers
